welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oud-Heverlee, a charming Belgian city known for its beautiful nature and historic sites. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in its unique charm and enjoy all that it has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or registration.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving mainly low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Users must accept the terms and conditions to connect.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
